com.lukflug.panelstudio.settings

Class ColorComponent

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.lukflug.panelstudio.FocusableComponent
      • com.lukflug.panelstudio.CollapsibleContainer
        • com.lukflug.panelstudio.settings.ColorComponent
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Component, Toggleable

    public class ColorComponent
extends CollapsibleContainer
    Component representing a color-valued setting.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      protected class  ColorComponent.ColorButton
      Class to render the rainbow button in the color container.
      protected class  ColorComponent.ColorSettingScheme
      ColorScheme to override the active color to the current value of the color setting.
      protected class  ColorComponent.ColorSlider
      Class to render the sliders in the color container.

        Parameters:
        title - the name of the setting
        description - the description for this component
        renderer - the renderer for the color setting container
        animation - the animation for opening and closing
        componentRenderer - the renderer for the children of the container
        setting - the setting in question
        alpha - whether to render an alpha slider
        rainbow - whether to render a rainbow slider
